TopicTitle: Change VAB lighting to be softer and more consistent.

Articles.Content: So the VAB lighting is really throwing me off. I don't think its a good idea to have weird shadows move around constantly on the ground in the background of you building your craft. It breaks the logical focal point of the VAB, by having those huge sun lit areas just jump around in there. I think the overall light level should be boosted so that the rockets arent so dim in comparison to that sunbeam, perhaps add some overhead/flood lights to keep the shadows under the craft if thats the aesthetic you were going for. The sun light should also be more diffuse and cast softer shadows. I think those changes will actually unironically significantly improve the VAB  usability, cause the current lighting literally leaves me feeling unwell every time i see it.
